General.Name: Jinyuan Cement Co Ltd
General.Description: Jinyuan EP Co., Ltd. engages in the cement, concrete, and environmental businesses. It offers cement, cement clinker, and ready mixed concrete; and recycles solid and hazardous waste, as well as engages in mining and refining upstream salt lake brine lithium mines, and manufactures lithium products used in new energy lithium batteries and other fields. The company was formerly known as Jinyuan Cement Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Jinyuan EP Co., Ltd. in May 2018. Jinyuan EP Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
